visual_style_summary: A minimalistic, ultra-premium visual approach emphasizing clarity, precision, and luxurious textures. The scene leverages a sleek gray studio background with polished gold surfaces, dramatic high-contrast lighting to highlight reflections and sparkle, and soft cinematic shadows. The overall tone is modern, sophisticated, and elegant, focusing on high-detail textures, smooth curves, and accurate reflections to showcase craftsmanship and brilliance.

scenes.description: Extreme macro shot capturing the diamond's sparkle and the delicate open-heart motif in sharp detail. Focus on the texture of the diamond, prong setting, and fine metal craftsmanship. The background is smooth and neutral, allowing the product to dominate.
scenes.camera_angle: Macro close-up, 100mm, f/2.8, focusing on the diamond and heart motif
scenes.camera_movement: Static with slight focus pull to enhance texture detail
scenes.lighting_setup: Dramatic spotlight with intense high-contrast illumination, highlighting sparkle and metal texture; soft cinematic shadows

scenes.description: Smooth, slow 360° rotation of the ring on a glossy, reflective surface. Emphasize the dual-tone finish (yellow and white gold), craftsmanship, and symmetry. Macro sparkle highlights appear during rotation, accentuating the brilliance of the diamond and polished gold.
scenes.camera_angle: Centered top-down view, orbiting at fixed height, maintaining product framing
scenes.camera_movement: Constant slow orbit at 10-15 seconds per full rotation
scenes.lighting_setup: Dramatic spotlight with high contrast, subtle light flares, and cinematic shadows to emphasize shape, reflections, and textures
focus_points: Reflections and sparkle highlights on facets

scenes.description: Gradual zoom out from the full ring, maintaining focus on craftsmanship while revealing the harmony of design. Incorporate cinematic shadows and subtle light flares to reinforce a luxurious ambiance. Conclude with a full profile view of the ring, emphasizing elegance and balance.
scenes.camera_angle: Eye-level, slight angle to highlight the open-heart motif and band curvature
scenes.camera_movement: Slow zoom out with gentle focus shift to maintain sharpness
scenes.lighting_setup: High-contrast spotlight with soft shadows, maintaining dramatic luminosity to accentuate surface highlights

technical_notes: Ensure consistent product geometry throughout all shots; reflections and sparkle highlights must be physically accurate, with no distortion or fake effects. Use soft, precise lighting to achieve high contrast with rich, realistic metallic and gemstone reflections. Maintain a monochrome palette emphasizing gray tones, polished gold surfaces, and sparkle details. No visual distortions or AI-generated variations; the product must stay identical in shape and proportions across all scenes.
